beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* reads data from stdin * calls an RMI servuice
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of an adaptor that processes data by calling an RMI service.
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config client.xml
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
Once it is running you need to type some data into the command line, for the processing to succeed, the rmi service it is connecting to needs to be running (see the server.xml example).
